Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_BlackScreenFix

Updates.en: Added Chi Zombie, Monk Blade Zombie
Updates.zh: 加入气功僵尸，武僧持刀僵尸

Updates.en: Optimized Mummy Memory Dangerroom gameplay experiences
Updates.zh: 优化木乃伊记忆无尽模式游玩体验

Updates.en: Added Level Objectives when entering levels with Star Challenges
Updates.zh: 有任务的关卡会在关卡开始前显示关卡任务

Updates.en: Added Grid Item Spawn for fanmade levels
Updates.zh: 关卡允许地物生成僵尸（不完全）

Updates.en: Added Rails & Carts for Dark Ages (Textures by @索菲sophine), Tutorial Gravestone, Pirate Gravestone, West Gravestone
Updates.zh: 加入黑暗时代样式的轨道和矿车（贴图由 @索菲sophine 制作）, 前院墓碑、海盗港湾墓碑、狂野西部墓碑

NewFeatures: 加入气功僵尸，武僧持刀僵尸
优化木乃伊记忆无尽模式游玩体验
有任务的关卡会在关卡开始前显示关卡任务
关卡允许地物生成僵尸（不完全）
加入黑暗时代样式的轨道和矿车（贴图由 @索菲sophine 制作）, 前院墓碑、海盗港湾墓碑、狂野西部墓碑
EnNewFeatures: Added Chi Zombie, Monk Blade Zombie
Optimized Mummy Memory Dangerroom gameplay experiences
Added Level Objectives when entering levels with Star Challenges
Added Grid Item Spawn for fanmade levels
Added Rails & Carts for Dark Ages (Textures by @索菲sophine), Tutorial Gravestone, Pirate Gravestone, West Gravestone
